text: I'm Thomas! I'm a competitive powerlifter and long time developer with experience in a variety of languages. I have a bachelor of science in Mechatronics Engineering and a bachelor of science in Computer Science from Southern Polytechnic. I'm currently working on my Master's in business administration at Clemson University. I hope to become proficient enough with Julia to eventually contribute to the language itself. That said, I'm just starting out with it. Can't wait to meet everyone!

text: That's neat. We're glad to meet you.
